TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PrefixOperator extends NUnit.Framework.Constraints.ConstraintOperator

Docs.summary: PrefixOperator takes a single constraint and modifies it's action in some way.

Docs.summary: Returns the constraint created by applying this prefix to another constraint.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reduce(class NUnit.Framework.Constraints.ConstraintBuilder/ConstraintStack stack) cil managed

Docs.summary: Reduce produces a constraint from the operator and any arguments. It takes the arguments from the constraint stack and pushes the resulting constraint on it.
